sql.query: ALTER TABLE content_type CHANGE view view varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'View';
ALTER TABLE content_type CHANGE view_single view_single varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'Page view for one single article';

CREATE TABLE content_type_group_items ( id_content_type_group int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, item varchar(50) NOT NULL, id_item int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, ordering int(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id_content_type_group,item,id_item) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
insert into content_type_group_items(id_content_type_group, item, id_item, ordering) select id_content_type_group, 'extend_field', id_extend_field, ordering from content_type_group_extend;
